audioText: J'ai rêvé de toi toute la nuit dernière.
question: What happened last night?
options: I dreamed of you all night
I wrote you a long letter
explanation: The text states 'J'ai rêvé de toi toute la nuit dernière' - I dreamed of you all night last night. 'Rêvé' is the past participle of 'rêver' (to dream), used in the passé composé.
